short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore the finest cities imagery out there right in your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The finest city imagery the internet has to offer right in your browser tabs. 

With this extension, in every new Chrome tab you’ll see exciting imagery of cities ranging from London and New York, all the way to Seoul and Tokyo. The artwork is refreshed every new tab. If a photograph happens to spark your curiosity, click the link on the left-bottom corner to check out that photographer's work.

UPDATE (v.1.1.0): Now you can make use of shortcuts for quicker navigation to your favourite pages. There is also a new history feature where you can see your last 3 images in case you wanted to check an image out but refreshed by accident. 

P.S: For the best experience, after installing Cities click the ‘Keep it’ button on the ‘Change back to Google’ notification. This will show Cities on each new tab as intended. 

P.P.S: A good internet connection is required to deliver quick loading times.
